keyMappings:
# Closing Tabs
map ww removeTab count=15
map wq closeTabsOnLeft
map we closeTabsOnRight
map W closeOtherTabs
map u removeTab
map U restoreTab

# Scrolling Fast
map J scrollDown count=3
map K scrollUp count=3

# History
map h goBack
map l goForward

# unmap unneeded
unmap d
unmap B
unmap gt
unmap gT

# Reload
map R reload hard

# pages
map gh goPrevious
map gl goNext

# Omnibar
unmap O
map o Vomnibar.activateInNewTab

# tabs
unmap T
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map b visitPreviousTab
unmap g0
map H previousTab
map L nextTab
unmap g$

# Links
map yn LinkHints.activateMode action=copy-text
map <s-Space> LinkHints.activateMode

# mimic American keyboard layout
map - enterFindMode
